messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Marty on the computer in the middle of the	night
messages.msgSnippet: ... My 11 y.o. ds took some stupid online test (Kaplan maybe?) which told him he s in 3rd grade.  He started asking me to teach him school-at-home.  I ve
messages.messageBody:
on 1/20/02 12:28 PM, ddzimlew@... at ddzimlew@... wrote:

> On Sun, 20 Jan 2002 15:13:44 EST SandraDodd@... writes:
>>
>> He's taking IQ tests when I'm asleep. What if he didn't score well
>> and it's
>> making him feel bad about himself? I'm amused that it's so
>> disturbing. I'd
>> almost rather he'd go back to the centaur porn.
>>
>> Sandra
>
>
> ROFLMAO!!
> This could be the secret identifying code between unschoolers. *Which
> would bother you more, your child taking a test or your child looking at
> porn.*
>
> I love this!

My 11 y.o. ds took some stupid online test (Kaplan maybe?) which told him
he's in 3rd grade. He started asking me to teach him school-at-home. I've
procrastinated ever since <g>

Nancy

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Marty on the computer in the middle of the night
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/20/02 3:14:33 PM, SandraDodd@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/20/02 3:14:33 PM, SandraDodd@... writes:

<< He's taking IQ tests when I'm asleep. What if he didn't score well and
it's
making him feel bad about himself? I'm amused that it's so disturbing. >>

Nick (12) went through a phase of taking online iq tests. I think it was a
way of estimating what an outside assessment of himself would look like, but
I don't know how seriously he took it. I like taking personality and iq
tests every once in a while just to see if I'm slowing down or enjoy the
latest did you know this about yourself trend.

Sharon

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Marty on the computer in the middle of the night

ROFLMAO!!
This could be the secret identifying code between unschoolers. *Which
would bother you more, your child taking a test or your child looking at
porn.*

I love this!

Thanks for the laugh!

Deb L

messages.subject: Marty on the computer in the middle of the night
messages.msgSnippet: OH NO. I came in and hoped a site I went to last night was still on the pulldown, but no, Marty filled it up with HIS junk.  No porn, nothing interesting, but
messages.messageBody:
OH NO.

I came in and hoped a site I went to last night was still on the pulldown,
but no, Marty filled it up with HIS junk. No porn, nothing interesting, but
THIS:


-=-Ready to see how smart you are? IQ tests are the standard way to measure
intelligence. And Emode's world-famous Ultimate IQ Test is the most thorough
and insightful IQ Test you can take online. It's free, it's private and it's
developed by PhDs. Don't miss out! Get your 15-page, scientifically valid
report at the end of the test. Good luck! -=-


The site needed a password so I couldn't see what kind of test it really was..

He's taking IQ tests when I'm asleep. What if he didn't score well and it's
making him feel bad about himself? I'm amused that it's so disturbing. I'd
almost rather he'd go back to the centaur porn.

Sandra
